description.overview: Emotions represents your heart, emotional security, and sensitivity to feelings around you.
description.detailed: This group combines three emotional dimensions: Love (romantic connection and openness), Inner Stability (emotional groundedness and resilience), and Sensitivity (empathy and emotional awareness). Together they show your overall emotional state. High scores mean your heart is open, you feel emotionally stable, and your sensitivity is a gift. Low scores suggest emotional distance, fragility, or overwhelming emotional absorption.

quiet.challenging: Your heart needs protection right now - honor that
quiet.mixed: Emotional energy is quiet - subtle feelings present
quiet.harmonious: Your heart is peacefully calm - enjoy the stillness

mild.challenging: Heart is tentative - don't force emotional openness
mild.mixed: Feelings are gentle and mixed - both present
mild.harmonious: Your heart is softly open - connection comes easily

moderate.challenging: Emotional defenses are up - work through resistance gently
moderate.mixed: Multiple emotional currents at once - both open and guarded
moderate.harmonious: Heart energy flows naturally - good for connection

high.challenging: Emotional intensity is strong - be gentle with yourself
high.mixed: Big feelings in all directions - honor the complexity
high.harmonious: Deep love and connection available - open to it

extreme.challenging: Emotional system overloaded - major protection or processing
extreme.mixed: Overwhelming feelings - both beautiful and difficult
extreme.harmonious: Heart completely open - profound connection possible
